Authors and Citation

        Author, maintainer

        Author

        Author


Citation
--------

Buyan A, Kellie D, Westgate M (2023). galaxias: Atlas of Living Australia (ALA) Data and Resources in Python. Python package version |version|. https://github.com/AtlasOfLivingAustralia/galaxias-python.
